descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffff00][size=5]Shield of Berantand Eng/Rus v1.1[/size][/color][/font][/center][color=#1e84cc]
[/color][color=#ffff00]Credits:[/color]
Ronnie Magnum - meshes, textures, location design.
Albert Zaigrov - soundtrack.
Dimonoider - scripts, Skyrim CK consulting.
9RedMen - exterior navmesh building.

[color=#ffff00]Description:[/color]
This mod adds a new Dwemer-style shield - Shield of Berantand. It can be obtained along with small but pleasant surprise in new Dwemer dungeon, what is halfway from Windhelm to Riften. This shield causes 15 pts. of Lightning damage while bashing and can be improved with a Dwarven ingot.

[color=#ffff00]Also[/color], this mod contains new musical track as background theme, composed by my good friend and colleague [color=#ffff00]Albert Zaigrov[/color]. You can download MP3 file (320kbps) in the optional files on this mod page.
Check out [url=http://albertzaigrov.com/]his website[/url] to explore his musical creativity.


[size=3][center][size=4][size=4][size=6]***[/size][/size][/size][/center]
[size=4]
Also:[/size]

Wanna see my another Skyrim mods? Check my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2931683]Skyrimnexus page[/url].

Join me on my [url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/RonnieMagnumModsAndOther/]Facebook group[/url] to be updated about my upcoming mods.

Or join me on [url=https://www.patreon.com/RonnieMagnum/overview]Patreon[/url] if you like my works![/size]
author: Ronnie Magnum
